subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Willie Randolph’s droll acknowledgment of the team’s failure offered a rare glimpse into a man whose public persona remained defiantly low-key and positive, even as the season was unraveling.
snippet: Willie Randolph’s droll acknowledgment of the team’s failure offered a rare glimpse into a man whose public persona remained defiantly low-key and positive, even as the season was unraveling.
